alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Clinch; Echols (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 10:09AM EDT until June 19 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Echols County in southeastern Georgia... Southern Atkinson County in southeastern Georgia... Northwestern Clinch County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 1100 AM EDT. * At 1008 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Nashville to near Moody Air Force Base to near I-75 At Exit 16, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Homerville, Statenville, Du Pont, Cogdell and Mayday. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
